products.title: Sprinkle Solar Lime Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Sprinkle solar lime pleated skylight blind in green/multicoloured. Made to measure from 40.94 with free uk mainland delivery. This pleated skylight blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A fun geometric-design, sprinkle solar comes in several shades. Perfect for adding modern splashes of colour to your home. Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer. A perfect thermal fabric.
 
 Product id: db-pls0140 fabric colour: lime material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.   Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Infusion Solar Lime Green Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Infusion solar lime green pleated skylight blind in green. Made to measure from 40.94 with free uk mainland delivery. This pleated skylight blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays.  
 The infusion solar lime green pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. 
 
 Product id: db-pls0087 fabric colour: lime green headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.   Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Roller, 4079 Olive Green - VELUX Loft Blind
products.metadescription: Roller, 4079 olive green - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.Offers both privacy and good looks.Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system.Fully integrated into the roof window.For an additional
products.productdescription: Softens the incoming light.Offers both privacy and good looks.Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system.Fully integrated into the roof window.For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience! The solar-rechargeable battery holds enough charge for up to 600 operations, even if there is no direct sunlight for recharging. Please note that the wall mounted control can also be used as a free standing remote control or if necessary, the blind can also be operated manually.

products.title: Lushious Lime (1266)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure lushious lime (1266) velux pleated blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux pleated blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside.

 	Softly diffuses incoming daylight.
 	Elegant, decorative lighting effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Slim, elegant side rails and top case.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	20 different colours and designs.

products.title: Green (1157)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure green (1157) velux energy blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux energy blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.

 	Blackout effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Improved insulation.
 	Sleek design - no visible cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	12 colour choices.
